attributes.action: Acess the visa fees paid to the home office
attributes.additional_details:
New Home Office Fees
 Visitor fees - £89
Leave to Remain - £993 (from £811).
ILR - £2,297 (from £1,875)
Naturalisation - £1,202 (from £1,236).
Registration of children - £973
Immigration and Nationality (Fees) Regulations 2017 SI 2017/515

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
